author: cnbc.com
title: Compass Minerals to Host Conference Call to Discuss First-Quarter 2018 Financial Results
text:
OVERLAND PARK, Kan.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Compass Minerals (NYSE: CMP) will release its first-quarter financial results Tuesday, May 1, after the markets close. The company’s president and CEO, Fran Malecha, and CFO, Jamie Standen, will discuss these results on a conference call to be held Wednesday, May 2, at 9:00 a.m. ET.
Access to the conference call will be available at www.CompassMinerals.com/InvestorRelations or by dialing 877-614-0009. Callers must provide the conference ID number 3347977. Outside of the U.S. and Canada, callers may dial 1-720-452-9074. An audio replay of the conference call will be available on the company’s website.
A summary of the company’s first-quarter performance will also be available at www.CompassMinerals.com/InvestorRelations prior to the conference call.
About Compass Minerals
Compass Minerals is a leading provider of essential minerals that solve nature’s challenges, including salt for winter roadway safety and other consumer, industrial and agricultural uses, and specialty plant nutrition minerals that improve the quality and yield of crops. Compass Minerals’ mission is to be the best essential minerals company by delivering where and when it matters. The company produces its minerals at locations throughout the U.S., Canada, Brazil and the U.K. For more information about Compass Minerals and its products, please visit www.compassminerals.com .
